title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
September 21, 2015

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate





	NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:

	Ricardo A. Aguilera, of Virginia, to be an Assistant Secretary of the Air Force, vice Lisa S. Disbrow.

	Janine Anne Davidson, of Virginia, to be Under Secretary of the Navy, vice Robert O. Work, resigned.

	Lisa S. Disbrow, of Virginia, to be Under Secretary of the Air Force, vice Eric K. Fanning, resigned.

	Eric K. Fanning, of the District of Columbia, to be Secretary of the Army, vice John M. McHugh.

	Shoshana Miriam Lew, of the District of Columbia, to be Chief Financial Officer, Department of Transportation, vice Sylvia I. Garcia, resigned.

	Jennifer M. O'Connor, of Maryland, to be General Counsel of the Department of Defense, vice Stephen Woolman Preston, resigned.

	Thomas A. Shannon, Jr., of Virginia, a Career Member of the Senior Foreign Service, Class of Career Ambassador, to be an Under Secretary of State (Political Affairs), vice Wendy Ruth Sherman.
